nodes.text: "Eyeball" was a slang term for TIE fighters. The New Republic pilot Rununja used it for TIE/ln space superiority starfighters during a skirmish at Jiruus. It was also used by Resistance bomber crews during the First Order/Resistance War.
The term "eyeball" was first used in the canon book The Last Jedi: Bomber Command. It was previously introduced in the Star Wars Legends novel X-Wing: Rogue Squadron.
